field.name: summary
field.value: Databinding through DataBindAttribute does not register errors with SmartDispatcherController

field.name: description
field.value:
The DataBindAttribute had no way of registering errors generated during binding with the SmartDispatcherController. I added a public property BoundInstanceErrors exposing the boundInstances field to SmartDispatcherController and modified the DataBindAttribute to store the generated errors like the controller it seld does. I found another issue in the process which is that in GetDataBindErrors(object instance) object stored in boundInstances are cast to ArrayList when they are in fact of type ErrorList an as a result the cast always returned null (no cast exception?) so the ErrorList returned always returned an empty list.
Patch attached
